channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaMeet Release History
item.description: 3/04/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Added support for meeting transcription in the following languages: Spanish, French, German, Danish, Polish, Thai, Hindi, Vietnamese, Japanese, and Korean. Fixed timestamp errors caused by daylight saving time adjustments. Corrected Chinese Wikipedia links. Fixed an issue where replacing a speaker caused misalignment in speaker layout. Adjusted the sorting order for the summary template list. 2/20/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Introduced Summary Templates, allowing users to apply different templates for meeting summaries.
